A religious inquisition: or, A short scrutinie after religion Wherein the large cope of true religion is narrowly inquired. By Iohn Cope, of Grayes-Inne, Esquire. Cope, John, of Gray's Inn.
[14], 120 p.
Printed by Felix Kingston, and are to be sold by Iames Boler at the Marigold in Paules Church-Yard, London : 1629.
Reproduction of the original in the Princeton Theological Seminary. Library.
